alert.note: Alert for Modoc County; Northeast Siskiyou and Northwest Modoc Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 4:17PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Modoc County through 445 PM PDT... At 416 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms 9 miles northeast of Howards Gulch Campground, or 16 miles west of Alturas, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Canby. This includes the following highways... Highway 299 in California between mile markers 20 and 27. Highway 139 in Modoc County California between mile markers 1 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Modoc County; Northeast Siskiyou and Northwest Modoc Counties
